name: Boss Sweep Scroll
description: Sweep the current highest level Boss that can be swept.

name: Copper Key
description: Used to open Copper Treasure Chest

name: Silver Key
description: Used to open Silver Treasure Chest

name: Gold Key
description: Can be used to open Gold Treasure Chest

name: Artifact Shard
description: 10 artifact shards can be used to synthesize an artifact

name: Quick Combat Scroll I
description: Gain 2 hours of Idling Rewards. Maximum of 5 every day.

name: Quick Combat Scroll Ⅱ
description: Gain 5 hours of Idling Rewards. Maximum of 5 every day.

name: Quick Combat Scroll Ⅲ
description: Gain 10 hours of Idling Rewards. Maximum of 5 every day.

name: Fashion scroll Ⅰ
description: Scroll used to redeem common Angel Fashion. 10 Fashion Scrolls Ⅰ can synthesize 1 Fashion Scroll Ⅱ.

name: Fashion scroll Ⅱ
description: Scroll used to redeem advance Angel Fashion. 10 Fashion Scrolls Ⅱ can synthesize 1 Fashion Scroll Ⅲ.

name: Fashion scroll Ⅲ
description: Scroll used to redeem platinum Angel Fashion

name: Standard Training Vial
description: Use it to randomly change Angel's basic Attribute in Standard training. 10 Standard Training Vials can be used to synthesize 1 Adv Training Vial.

name: Adv. Training Vial
description: Use it to randomly change Angel's basic Attribute in Advanced training. 10 Adv Training Vials can be used to synthesize 1 Platinum Training Vial.

name: Platinum Training Vial
description: Use it to randomly change Angel's basic Attribute in Platinum training. 10 Platinum Training Vials can be used to synthesize 1 Supreme Training Vial.

name: Supreme Training Vial
description: Use it to randomly change Angel's basic Attribute in Supreme training.
